name: Last Stand (DoloDev)
description:
Take a swig of your ale and  grab your hammer for One Last Stand.

You play as Gimrik, the last standing dwarf in the great kingdom of Bunboramm. There is no hope against the mighty Nadir, the undead foe hunting dwarfs for generations. 

Game submit for Mini Jam- Overload

Accomplished designing a scoring system and spawning system.

Credits-Opsive, Procedual Worlds, KriptoFX, Triplebrick,Anatoly Arkhipov, Protfactor, Maksim Bugrimov, Linust.
